amendment.description: An amendment numbered 177 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds for the Secretary of Agriculture to implement or enforce Subpart B of the Travel Management Rule, relating to the designation of roads, trails, and areas for motor vehicle use, in any administrative unit of the National Forest System.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Herger amendment (A113) Agreed to by recorded vote: 227 - 197 (Roll no. 113).
